script:
;;じゃあ帰ろっか…,中
;;キライはスキの裏返し,大
;;祈るだけ祈ろう,小
# script "lisp"
# fadein "black" 0.5
# background %(background)s
# bgmfile "bgm256" "BgmSeaDate" 0
# body %(unit_a)s
# pos %(unit_a)s 3
# mask %(unit_a)s off
# chara %(unit_a)s
# textflame 0 0
@
マスターは
レシェフを誘って
教会にやってきたのだが…

# voice 2013 "reshef_0007"
# face %(unit_a)s "angry"
# textflame 1 1
@レシェフ
教会とか大キライ
帰りたい
;;----------------------------------------

# textflame 1 1
@%(unitName:unit_a)s
神に祈る人はキライじゃない
でもここはすごくイヤ！

# select "じゃあ帰ろっか…" "select_label_01" "キライはスキの裏返し" "select_label_02" "祈るだけ祈ろう" "select_label_03"
神に祈る人はキライじゃない
でもここはすごくイヤ！

# label "select_label_01"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_02"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_03"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_end"
# waitandnext 0.1

# fadeout "black" 1.2
# waitandnext 2
